title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. Launch WSWB and create two projects. 2. Under each project, create a new file with the same name (e.g., 'foo.txt'). 3. From the main menu, select File > Export and choose Zip File to export. 4.
OB: The files are not exported to the zip file correctly.
EB: All the files with the same name under different directories should be successfully exported to the zip file.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow the steps mentioned above.
